title: WhiteTreeBible - Blog
description: A blog about faith, technology, and life

items.title: Reflections on Ruth
items.content_html: I chose to dissect Ruth as a test subject for my biblical connections project because it is a short book that is fairly self contained. I didn't expect to find anything surprising or insightful as I worked out how to standardize or automate my process for importing and tagging the text. Never underestimate the Bible.

items.title: Project Update
items.content_html: Wow, it's been over a year and a half since I last posted on my personal blog. Life has been busy, and I've been trying to keep up with everything else. I'm shocked that I didn't post through the Intuit layoff and transition to SwineTech or all the crazy things I've done and learned since then. Here's an update:
